product_name: DAKINE Apex 26L Hydration Pack - 100 fl oz. - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Generously sized so you can pack for a full day of riding, the DAKINE Apex 26L Hydration Pack offers plenty of room for clothes and food plus an included 100 fl. oz. reservoir for fluids. 26-liter gear capacity and 3-liter hydration reservoir let you pack both gear and liquids for extended time on the trails. Hydration reservoir with 45deg angled bite valve and quick-disconnect tube features a large opening so you can fill it easily. Separate compartment for hydration reservoir makes it easy to load and unload; insulating foam helps keep liquids cold. Breathable pack panel features suspended mesh to maximize breathability; sternum strap and removable waistbelt add stability. Gear space includes a large main compartment with internal organization; front zippered pocket; front mesh stash pocket; fleece-lined goggles pocket; small zip side pocket. Front panel expands via sdjustable webbing straps to carry full-face or standard bike helmets. DAKINE Apex 26L Hydration Pack features side compression straps to secure gear in place. Closeout.
short_description: Generously sized so you can pack for a full day of riding, the DAKINE Apex 26L Hydration Pack offers plenty of room for clothes and food plus an included 100 fl. oz. reservoir for fluids.
